command: WITHHELD_FOR_SAFETY - mshta variant: remote scriptlet (.sct) loading from PowerShell
explanation: Shows PowerShell starting mshta to load a remote scriptlet resource, abusing the script host to proxy execution under a trusted binary.
rationale_steps: Use PowerShell to spawn mshta with a URL or path to a scriptlet resource
The signed host interprets and runs scriptlet code on load
This can bypass basic allowlists focused on parent process or binary signatures
Detect by correlating process creation, network connection, and rare file extensions tied to mshta
Apply control policies to block scriptlet interpretation by mshta where not needed
